title: "Did you know" facts colour change
body:
Thanks to the new background load in screen (which is awesome by the way :D) the "did you know" section that occasionally appears is impossible to read. This needs to be fixed because my favorite thing about league is the did you know facts (and reking noobs!)
Thanks,
-BrodeRage

replies.body:
Yeah don't think anyone really cares, as shown by my last topic when the new loading screen came out.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/YYgQrtEc-loading-screen-tips

They need to fix it so that the light isn't so tremendously bright, or that they are done with the color's of font psychology thing they did.
